data.comment: The match has started at Molineux Stadium.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 4, In Wolverhampton, Nelson Semedo of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton attack but Romain Saiss's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
In the minute 7, Wolverhampton's Conor Coady misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Stuart Attwell awards Chelsea a goal kick.
Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Wolverhampton.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 14, Stuart Attwell signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Throw-in Chelsea.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 16, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Chelsea.
Stuart Attwell signals a throw-in for Chelsea, close to Wolverhampton's area.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Wolverhampton.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. Chelsea have an attacking throw-in.
Chelsea's Kurt Zouma gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolverhampton defender.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 20, Olivier Giroud's header is off-target for Chelsea.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
Pedro Neto of Wolverhampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 23, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Wolverhampton pushes forward through Ruben Neves, whose finish on goal is saved.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for Chelsea in Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 31, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In Wolverhampton Wolverhampton attack through Nelson Semedo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 31, In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Chelsea push forward at Molineux Stadium and Timo Werner gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolverhampton defence.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 33, Stuart Attwell signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Chelsea close to the penalty box.
Stuart Attwell awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Throw-in for Chelsea close to the penalty box.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Kurt Zouma heads against the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Chelsea.
In the minute 45, Chelsea's Olivier Giroud breaks free at Molineux Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Chelsea are pushing forward but Reece James's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 46, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Wolverhampton make their first substitution with Ebeguowen Otasowie replacing Leander Dendoncker.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 49, Goal! Chelsea have got their heads in front thanks to a Olivier Giroud strike.
Benjamin Chilwell with an assist there.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Chelsea's Reece James gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 52, Stuart Attwell awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Molineux Stadium.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Wolverhampton.
In the minute 55, Stuart Attwell blows against Wolverhampton's Fabio Silva for offside.
In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 60, Mason Mount (Chelsea) has received a yellow card from Stuart Attwell.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Nuno Espirito Santo (Wolverhampton) is making a second substitution, with Adama Traore replacing Fabio Silva.
In the minute 62, Free kick Wolverhampton.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
The match at Molineux Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Adama Traore, who is down injured.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Adama Traore is back on the pitch.
In the minute 65, Willy Boly for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
Goal! Daniel Podence equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 66, Great play from Ebeguowen Otasowie to set up the goal.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Wolverhampton to check on Adama Traore, who is grimacing with pain.
Wolverhampton's Adama Traore is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 69, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Daniel Podence is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 71, Frank Lampard is making the team's first substitution at Molineux Stadium with Mateo Kovacic replacing Kai Havertz.
Tammy Abraham is replacing Olivier Giroud for Chelsea at Molineux Stadium.
Daniel Podence has recovered and rejoins the match in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Wolverhampton.
Stuart Attwell signals a Chelsea throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea.
Reece James gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chelsea.
In the minute 77, Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
In the minute 77, Ebeguowen Otasowie (Wolverhampton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Daniel Podence for Wolverhampton has been booked by Stuart Attwell and receives a first yellow card.
Chelsea's Mateo Kovacic gets in a shot on goal at Molineux Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea drives forward and Mateo Kovacic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
In the minute 85, In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Chelsea's N`Golo Kante has been booked in Wolverhampton.
Throw-in Chelsea.
In the minute 86, Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Wolverhampton.
Benjamin Chilwell of Chelsea gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Willy Boly looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Stuart Attwell signals a Chelsea throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
The home team have replaced Daniel Podence with Vitinha. This is the third substitution made today by Nuno Espirito Santo.
Attention is being given to Wolverhamptonâ€™s Willy Boly and play has been suspended briefly.
Nelson Semedo (Wolverhampton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Pedro Neto gives Wolverhampton a 2-1 lead in Wolverhampton.
Vitinha instrumental with a fine assist.
